name: SetValueFromJSON
friendlyName: Set variable with value from JSON
description: Extracts a value from a json source (file or content) using JSONPath and sets it's value to a variable.
author: Yod Labs

inputs.name: variableName
inputs.label: Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the variable you wish to set the value to. Either a new or an existing one.

inputs.name: jsonPathExpression
inputs.label: JSONPath expression
inputs.helpMarkDown: JSONPath expression to get the value. If returned value is an object it will be returned in it's textual form. If it's an array it will be returned with a comma as a separator.

inputs.name: json
inputs.label: JSON content
inputs.helpMarkDown: The JSON data to extract the value from. If you don't specify, JSON content you need to specify a file (if you specify both JSON content will be used)

inputs.name: jsonFile
inputs.label: JSON file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file with the JSON to extract the value from. If you don't specify a file, you have to specify JSON content
